verses.verse: And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6817>together,<s%> and <S%H5674>went<s%> <S%H6828>northward,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> <S%H4069>Wherefore<s%> passedst thou <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and didst <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> us to <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee? we will <S%H8313>burn<s%> thine <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H589>I<s%> and my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> at great <S%H376>strife<s%> <S%H7379><s%> <S%H3966><s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon;<s%> and when I <S%H2199>called<s%> you, ye <S%H3467>delivered<s%> me <S%H3808>not<s%> out of their <S%H4480>hands.<s%> <S%H3027><s%>

And when I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> ye <S%H3467>delivered<s%> me <S%H369>not,<s%> I <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%> in my <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into my <S%H3027>hand:<s%> <S%H4100>wherefore<s%> then are ye come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against me?

Then <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> gathered <S%H6908>together<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim:<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H859>Ye<s%> <S%H1568>Gileadites<s%> are <S%H6412>fugitives<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H669>Ephraimites,<s%> and <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H4519>Manassites.<s%>

And the <S%H1568>Gileadites<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4569>passages<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> before the <S%H669>Ephraimites:<s%> and it <S%H1961>was<s%> so, that <S%H3588>when<s%> those <S%H669>Ephraimites<s%> which were <S%H6412>escaped<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let me go <S%H5674>over;<s%> that the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Art <S%H859>thou<s%> an <S%H673>Ephraimite?<s%> If he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>Nay;<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> they unto him, <S%H559>Say<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H7641>Shibboleth:<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5451>Sibboleth:<s%> for he could <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3559>frame<s%> to <S%H1696>pronounce<s%> it <S%H3651>right.<s%> Then they <S%H270>took<s%> him, and <S%H7819>slew<s%> him <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H4569>passages<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan:<s%> and there <S%H5307>fell<s%> at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H4480>Ephraimites<s%> <S%H669><s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

And <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%> Then <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> the <S%H1569>Gileadite,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in one of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

And he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> whom he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H2351>abroad,<s%> and took <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%> for his <S%H1121>sons.<s%> And he <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
And <S%H356>Elon<s%> the <S%H2075>Zebulonite<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in <S%H357>Aijalon<s%> in the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H2075>Zebulun.<s%>

And he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H1121>nephews,<s%> <S%H1121><s%> that <S%H7392>rode<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> ass <S%H5895>colts:<s%> and he <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And <S%H5658>Abdon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1985>Hillel<s%> the <S%H6553>Pirathonite<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in <S%H6552>Pirathon<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H6003>Amalekites.<s%>
